snippet.title: Galaxian for 2600 - Best Shmups Games (Atari 1983)
snippet.description:
Galaxian - 2600, one of the best shmups games. You can take your best shot and read, watch, listen and play the history of Galaxians at my video game history website The Dot Eaters: https://thedoteaters.com/?bitstory=bitstory-article-2/galaxian

A surprisingly excellent home game adaptation of the hit arcade game to the Atari 2600, probably due to the fact that arcade game developer Namco themselves did it. One of the best shmups games for early game consoles.

Facebook 🕹️ https://www.facebook.com/thedoteaters
Twitter 🕹️  https://twitter.com/doteaters
YouTube 🕹️ https://www.youtube.com/user/Umma6umma
Pinterest 🕹️ https://www.pinterest.com/thedoteaters/

-~-~~-~~~-~~-~-
View the goofy glitch that makes playing Access Software's classic game Leader Board Golf so much fun: 
https://youtu.be/HnEN942x5rY
-~-~~-~~~-~~-~-
